attributes.name: type
attributes.desc: menu button type, refer to `Button` Component, only works when `split-button` is true

attributes.name: size
attributes.desc: menu size, also works on the split button

attributes.name: split-button
attributes.desc: whether a button group is displayed

attributes.name: hide-on-click
attributes.desc: whether to hide menu after clicking menu-item

attributes.name: show-timeout
attributes.desc: Delay time before show a dropdown (only works when trigger is `hover`)

attributes.name: hide-timeout
attributes.desc: Delay time before hide a dropdown (only works when trigger is `hover`)

slots.desc: content of Dropdown. Notice: Must be a valid html dom element (ex. `<span>, <button> etc.`) or `el-component`, to attach the trigger listener

slots.name: dropdown
slots.desc: content of the Dropdown Menu, usually a `<el-dropdown-menu>` element

events.name: @click
events.desc: if `split-button` is `true`, triggers when left button is clicked

events.name: @command
events.desc: triggers when a dropdown item is clicked
events.param: the command dispatched from the dropdown item

events.name: @visible-change
events.param: true when it appears, and false otherwise
